sections.title: Calm dental visits on your terms
sections.body: If you feel anxious about treatment, we slow the pace, explain clearly, and give you choices at every step. Nothing happens until you say so.
bullets: Gentle, calm tone with clear language
You decide the pace with planned pauses

sections.title: Common worries we plan for
items: Past bad experiences or feeling rushed

sections.eyebrow: How we care for nervous patients
sections.title: Support that keeps you in control
items: Longer appointments so you can pause and breathe
Agreed stop signals and check-ins throughout
Choice of coping methods suited to you

sections.title: Pick the support that feels right
sections.body: We guide you through calming options and let you choose what feels safest—whether that’s gentle numbing tech, measured relaxation, or easing jaw tension first.
bullets: Painless numbing with The Wand keeps anaesthetic slow and steady
Dental sedation options add deeper relaxation when assessed as suitable
TMJ & jaw comfort care reduces tension that can trigger anxiety

sections.title: Learn how each option works before you decide
sections.strapline: Read the dedicated pages to see how they manage anxiety and comfort.
